Binary: libsfml-dev, libsfml-audio2.4, libsfml-graphics2.4, libsfml-network2.4, libsfml-system2.4, libsfml-window2.4, libsfml-doc
Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 10), cmake (>= 2.8.9), doxygen, g++ (>= 6), libflac-dev, libfreetype6-dev, libgl1-mesa-dev, libjpeg-dev, libopenal-dev, libudev-dev [linux-any], libusbhid-dev [kfreebsd-any], libvorbis-dev, libx11-dev, libxrandr-dev
Package-List: libsfml-audio2.4 deb libs optional arch=any libsfml-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libsfml-doc deb doc optional arch=all libsfml-graphics2.4 deb libs optional arch=any libsfml-network2.4 deb libs optional arch=any libsfml-system2.4 deb libs optional arch=any libsfml-window2.4 deb libs optional arch=any
